content.en: Motor control algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the efficacy and performance of various algorithms for controlling motor drives. These algorithms include fuzzy logic controllers, hybrid fuzzy-PI controllers, fuzzy sliding mode controllers, adaptive fuzzy control schemes, neuro-fuzzy control methods, and more. The studies aim to determine the effectiveness of these algorithms in improving the speed control and performance of permanent magnet synchronous motors (PMSMs) and interior permanent magnet synchronous motors (IPMSMs).
content.da: Motorstyringsalgoritmer: Forskere har unders√∏gt effektiviteten og ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer til styring af motorer. Disse algoritmer inkluderer fuzzy logik kontroller, hybride fuzzy-PI kontroller, fuzzy glidende tilstandskontroller, adaptive fuzzy kontrolordninger, neuro-fuzzy kontrolmetoder og flere. Studierne sigter mod at bestemme effektiviteten af disse algoritmer til forbedring af hastighedskontrol og ydeevne for permanent magnet synkronmotorer (PMSM'er) og interior permanent magnet synkronmotorer (IPMSM'er).
